title: Police: Williamsburg shooter, victim identified
content:
WHITLEY COUNTY, Ky. (WYMT) - A woman suffered serious injuries after a shooting Thursday morning in Williamsburg.
Police say they responded to a reported shooting around 9 a.m. on Mt. Morgan Road and found Natasha Archer on the ground. She was shot in the shoulder.
Archer was flown to the University of Tennessee Medical Center for serious injuries where she is stable.
Police say the shooter is Chris Creekmore, but it may have been accidental.
Nearby Williamsburg Independent School went under lockdown for a short time after the shooting.
Police have not arrested anyone.
